job.content2: Lightning Web Components (LWC), Apex (Strongly Typed, Java)
job.content4: Software Developer (Level 6 Bachelor +3/4 level) certification, Web Developer (Level 5 Bachelor +2 level) certification
job.detail1: I am studying the polymorphism and classes of Java to write efficient object-oriented programming.
job.detail2: I am deepening my understanding of object-oriented languages by utilizing Spring and JPA, and I am currently looking for an apprenticeship contract.
job.detail3: I developed a managed digital resume project within the company, created a demo page, and designed various forms (promotion, participant, questionnaire, etc.).
job.detail4: I performed full-stack development using LWC and APEX, and created desktop and mobile web designs using Figma.
job.detail5: I participated in the shooting management software project, where I was responsible for A-Z mobile design and UI development. Additionally, I created a demo page.
job.detail6: I performed front-end development using React and TypeScript, and created desktop, tablet, and mobile web designs using Figma.
job.detail7: I learned how to add animations using JavaScript and handle complex data by integrating with APIs. I developed dynamic web applications using the React framework, managed state with Redux, and acquired back-end development skills using Node.js, Express, and MongoDB. I also learned SEO optimization and web accessibility improvement techniques to enhance website performance.

kim.description1: Currently, I am learning the basics of Java and studying overall back-end development through the Java framework Spring. After learning the basic syntax of Java and the concepts of object-oriented programming, I am understanding the fundamental principles and structures of back-end development by learning powerful frameworks such as Spring Boot.
kim.description2: In front-end development, I mainly used React and TypeScript. By leveraging React's component-based architecture, I designed reusable UI components and improved code readability and maintainability through TypeScript. These skills allowed me to create an efficient working environment even for large-scale projects.
kim.description3: Project management and team collaboration are also among my strengths. Through project management experience based on agile methodology, I communicated and cooperated efficiently with team members to successfully lead projects. By adopting the Scrum technique, I established sprint plans, shared team progress through daily stand-up meetings, and improved projects by reflecting continuous feedback.
kim.description4: In the future, I will strive to become a developer who continuously grows and develops. I will learn the latest technology trends and new tools, and apply them to practical work to propose better solutions. Additionally, I will contribute to open-source projects, exchange with developer communities to gain diverse perspectives and experiences, and further strengthen my technical capabilities.

services.description1: I have full-stack development experience using Apex(Java) and React in various projects. I utilized Redux for state management and conducted styling with Styled-components and MUI. I can handle SQL and NoSQL databases and also performed design work through Figma.
services.description2: I participate in developer communities to refer to various logics, develop new logics through research, and test them to improve my development skills.

about.title: About
about.description: I have back-end development experience using Apex(Java) and front-end development experience using React and TypeScript. I use Redux.js for state management and Styled-components and Material-UI for styling. Through these diverse experiences, I have acquired full-stack development capabilities and improved my project management and team collaboration skills based on agile methodology. I will continue to grow and develop as a developer.
